eng.title: Hello, it's great to see you here!
eng.text:
Currently, I'm a part of the development team at Logcomex, a company focused on intelligence in foreign trade and international logistics. My work involves building scalable software solutions to present information in an intelligent and customizable manner, creating dashboards for comparative analysis, detailed visualizations, and many other insights using information from our data warehouse in a BI fashion.

My first experience with programming was with PHP, around 2015, while I was pursuing my IT Technician degree. Later on, I worked with Java (EE), developing and maintaining web servers, initially in a monolithic approach with Java and Primefaces in JSF, and later with Java APIs and other frameworks on the frontend with JS.

In more recent years, my programming paradigm shifted once again, and I started working with microservices here at Logcomex. This has been very enriching for my career, given the challenge of orchestrating and choreographing those services, as well as working with different languages in the same infrastructure. Currently, in my team, I primarily maintain services in PHP (Lumen/Laravel) and Python (FastAPI), and my work mainly focuses on the backend, providing architectural insights and developing solutions.
